Quotez - Senior Full-Stack Engineer - Berlin, Germany - REMOTE (CET) - Full-time

With Quotez we aim to disrupt the services industry. We are applying AI to make complex services bookable and eliminate the need for onsite appointments.

We are looking for a senior engineer with at least five years of full stack experience, a strong focus on product and UX, and optionally some experience building LLM based products. Currently we are focussed on building tooling that enables us to capture domain knowledge from experts to streamline prompt creation and evaluation. Our tech stack is Typescript, React, Next.js and Tailwind. On the backend we use Drizzle with Neon, deployed and monitored via Vercel. We have pre-seed funding from a major US VC and are experienced founders.
